verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H413>meet<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> Shouldest thou <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H7563>ungodly,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> <S%H2063>therefore<s%> is <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> there are <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thee, in <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast taken <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H842>groves<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and hast <S%H3559>prepared<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> through the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H4480>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H884><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and brought them <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H5892>city,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> Take <S%H7200>heed<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H6213>do:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who is <S%H5973>with<s%> you in the <S%H1697>judgment.<s%> <S%H4941><s%>

Wherefore <S%H6258>now<s%> let the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you; take <S%H8104>heed<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> it: <S%H3588>for<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> nor <S%H4856>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons,<s%> nor <S%H4727>taking<s%> of <S%H7810>gifts.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> did <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and of the <S%H4480>chief<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for <S%H7379>controversies,<s%> when they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H530>faithfully,<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And what cause <S%H3605>soever<s%> <S%H7379><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> you of your <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> ye shall even <S%H2094>warn<s%> them that they <S%H816>trespass<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and so <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H251>brethren:<s%> <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> and ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H816>trespass.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>matters:<s%> also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you. <S%H6213>Deal<s%> <S%H2388>courageously,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H2896>good.<s%>
